title: veNuvu vinipinchi
sahitya:
vENuvu vinipinci  tEne lolikinci
mAnasa lAlasamu kalga jEyu krishnA!

anupallavi

dhIna jana vanA! nI dhari jErina
dhyAnula moralanu mana sAramati yinci 

caraNam

gAnamuto paramAnandamu pondE
gnAnamosagi nannu brocina dEvA!
prANamuto lInamaina rAjIva locanuDaina ma-
hAnu bhAva nI
